author: Woo Bih Li J:
casename: Magaforce Construction v Khamso Wirat and Others
counsel: Gopinath Pillai (Tan Peng Chin LLC) for the applicant; M P Rai (Cooma and Rai) for the third and fourth respondents
tags-parsed: Employment Law/Employee of sub-subcontractor claiming compensation under Act for injuries suffered in traffic accident/Whether subcontractor hiring sub-subcontractor liable to pay compensation as principal under s 17(1) of Act/Section 17 Workmen's Compensation Act (Cap 354, 1998 Rev Ed)

Employment Law/Whether definition of "place" within s 17(5) of Act including lorry travelling on road/Whether principal liable for accident happening to workmen while travelling on transport provided by principal/Sections 3, 17 Workmen's Compensation Act (Cap 354, 1998 Rev Ed)
